00032 #include <element.h>
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include "SourceFunc.h"
00035 #include "Circuit.h"
00036 
00037 class Source : public TwoTerminal
00038 {
00039 
00040 protected:
00041   SourceFunc* Func;
00042   
00043 public:
00044     Source(std::string _n1, std::string _n2):TwoTerminal(_n1,_n2){};
00045     ~Source(){
00046         delete Func;
00047     };
00048     virtual double update_B(BMatrix::Dense<double> &B,double time)=0;
00049 };

00052 /*-------CurrentSource Class ----------------- */
00053 class CurrentSource : public Source
00054 {
00055 private:
00056       int n1_index; //the index of node1
00057       int n2_index; //the index of node2
00058       
00059       
00060       
00061 public:
00062      CurrentSource(std::string _n1, std::string _n2, SourceFunc* _Func):Source(_n1,_n2){
00063           name = std::string("CurrentSource")+".+"+n1+".-"+n2;
00064           Func = _Func;
00065      };
00066      
00067      CurrentSource(std::string _name, std::string _n1, std::string _n2, SourceFunc* _Func):Source(_n1,_n2){
00068           Func = _Func;
00069           name = _name;
00070      };
00071      
00072     
00073     double update_B(BMatrix::Dense<double> &B, double time);
00074     
00075     void add_my_nodes(Circuit* circuit);
00076     
00077     void write_stamp(BMatrix::Sparse<double> &G, BMatrix::Sparse<double> &C, Circuit* circ);
00078     
00079     bool is_linear(){ return true;} ;
00080     
00081 };

00083 /*-------Voltage Source Class ----------------- */
00084 class VoltageSource : public Source
00085 {
00086 private:
00087       int n1_index; //the index of node1
00088       int n2_index; //the index of node2
00089       int current_index; //the index of the extra current variable
00090       
00091       
00092 public:
00093      VoltageSource(std::string _n1, std::string _n2, SourceFunc* _Func):Source(_n1,_n2){
00094           name = std::string("VoltageSource")+".+"+n1+".-"+n2;
00095           Func = _Func;
00096      };
00097

00099           Func = _Func;
00100           name = _name;
00101      };

00103
